name: MEC Hut Booties - Unisex
description:
For years, MEC Hut Booties have been the secret weapon of savvy skiers and ice climbers. And we just keep making them better and better. Now, they have a Pertex Quantum nylon shell designed to trap air and mimprove their warmth efficiency. Soft footbeds are a treat for your feet after long days in heavy boots. Textured soles and ankle drawcords let you make quick forays to the woodpile without losing any delicious warmth.Uppers are Pertex Quantum ripstop nylon with TPU rands to protect against abrasion and DWR to shed light moisture.Nylon lining breathes well to keep your feet comfortable.100g Hyperloft polyester insulation is 50% recycled.Ankle drawcords seal in heat and seal out snow.9mm insoles are EVA foam for insulation that won’t crush underfoot.Soft polyester tricot footbeds for comfort.Instep drawcords let you create a snug fit to eliminate cold voids.Textured TPU anti-slip soles.

        Sustainability
